about.subtitle: Software Engineer based in Brazil, specializing in both Front and Back-End development with a strong business background.
about.rundown: I've cultivated a diverse portfolio of experience by collaborating with a variety of companies, continuously honing my skills, and collaborating with talented individuals. Here's a summary of my journey:

projects.introduction: Over the years, I've undertaken numerous projects, each holding a special place in my journey. Many of these endeavors are open-source, inviting you to delve into the codebase and share your insights for potential enhancements. Your collaboration is greatly appreciated and valued!

experience0.title: Founder and Data Analyst
experience0.point0: Achieved an average increase of 20% in impressions compared to similar campaigns from other agencies.
experience0.point1: Successfully managed campaigns exceeding the total investment of R$ 250,000.
experience0.point2: Develop APIs to fetch data and analyse Influencer's key metrics

experience1.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
experience1.point0: Collaborated in the development of the Transfero Prime platform and application, utilizing technologies such as React, React Native, TypeScript, .NET Core 5.0, C#, and SQL.
experience1.point1: Contributed to the development and maintenance of the API and infrastructure responsible for processing over $1 million daily in payments, using SQL, .NET, and C#
experience1.point2: Created a Python script to automate the updating of prices for various cryptocurrencies
experience1.point3: Contributed to a high-performing agile team of software engineers, product owners, and business leaders, identifying opportunities, flaws, and developing effective solutions.

experience2.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience2.point0: Structured key product metrics data at Globo using SQL, Google BigQuery, and Python.
experience2.point1: Suggested innovative ideas by analyzing user behavior and comparative data (such as user activity, total users, and Google Analytics behavioral data) across all of Globo's digital products, including G1, BBB, GE, GShow, Globoplay, and others, aiming to report, enhance usability, and analyze consumer behavior.
experience2.point2: Developed automated jobs and processes to efficiently fetch and visualize data.

experience3.title: Innovation Intern
experience3.point0: Contributed to the development of an AI framework (Python MVP) dedicated to managing and handling consumer data, resulting in improvements in product personalization.

experience4.title: Co-Founder and Director
experience4.point0: Achieved over 5 titles in 3 different gaming categories involving a total of 100 students.
